plot: A son sets out to understand his white American father's lost China past, embarking on a journey that becomes a profound exploration of what home really means.
title: Made in China
plot_es: A son sets out to understand his white American father's lost China past, embarking on a journey that becomes a profound exploration of what home really means.
plot_en: A son sets out to understand his white American father's lost China past, embarking on a journey that becomes a profound exploration of what home really means.
